

I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format as format
                             from address_format
                             where address_format_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select countries_name
                      from countries
                      where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select zone_code
                   from zones
                   where zone_country_id = '44'
                   and zone_id = '0';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format_id as format_id
                             from countries
                             where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format as format
                             from address_format
                             where address_format_id = '1';

                      from countries
                      where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process

Explain 
select zone_code
                   from zones
                   where zone_country_id = '44'
                   and zone_id = '0';

                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';

                             from countries

I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_email_format from customers where customers_email_address= 'test@test.com';
